TRADE_DESCRIPTION: Buy or sell items in the market
ENTER_VALID_ORDER_NUMBER: {{author}} Please enter a valid order number
INVALID_ORDER_NUMBER: The order number you provided is invalid
ORDER_NOTE_INFO:
- __{{flag}} now__ - It will be executed immediately at the best available rate or else it will get cancelled 
- __Order__ - It will be executed when the rate you have selected is available. The cost will be deducted beforehand. 
- Items will be immediately deducted when you make an order. Go to my orders to remove an existing order.
NO_PRICE_MARKET_ORDER: You cannot set a specific price when using a Market Order
ENTER_PRICE_QUANTITY: Please enter a price and quantity
VALID_AMOUNT_GEMS: The price should range between {{start}} and {{end}} <:gemgame:862598030562033694>
WAIT_FOR_ORDERS: There are currently no {{tradeType}} available in the market. Please wait for the orders to appear.
NOT_ENOUGH_ITEM_SELL: You do not have enough {{itemEmoji}} to sell
NOT_ENOUGH_ITEM_BUY: You do not have enough {{itemEmoji}} to buy
NO_MATCHING_ORDERS_FOUND: No matching orders found but the order is listed on the market
